name: Dream Visage Demo
description:
A demo for my current project where every level is based off a dream. This is the largest game I've ever attempted to make. As always, thanks for playing!

Controls: 
WASD to move, E to interact, Escape to instantly quit.

Questions and Answers:
-When will the final game be released? When it is ready. One year at the latest.

-Is this part done? Nope, a lot of it will be updated/redone.

-Why doesn't the story make sense? Probably because it is randomized. The order of every play-through is randomized. This will be a major feature in the final game, with the collectible eyes (I call them "Bridges") being key to organizing them.

-Where can I follow updates on this? I'll be trying to post regular/significant updates on my twitter and possibly on itch as well.

Sound credits (All from Freesound.org): 
-Desert Wind -  "Wind, Soft. Crickets.wav" by Leandros.Ntounis (Altered) / "Throat singing.wav" by Metzik (Altered)
-Desert Pool - "Stream, Water, C.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk)
-Jungle - "yucatan jungle.mp3" by folkart films (Altered)
-Cinema - "circus music loop.wav" by Kris Klavenes (Altered)
